author: Andy MacElhone
description: Lurid blue, easy-drinking zesty citrusy. This cocktail is also known as The Swimming Pool and lounging beside one, or at least imagining you are, is what this cocktail is about.
name: Blue Lagoon

recipeInstructions.text: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and STIR
Fill glass with ice and TOP with lemon-lime soda

video.description: Lurid blue, easy-drinking zesty citrusy. This cocktail is also known as The Swimming Pool and lounging beside one, or at least imagining you are, is what this cocktail is about.
video.name: HOWTO make Blue Lagoon
